ygData.subject: Re: Song Lock Whip?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a possible solution, though I have not had this problem myself.  Use the command /stopsong I have no idea the purpose to that command otherwise. Roop
ygData.messageBody:
I have a possible solution, though I have not had this problem myself. Use
the command /stopsong

I have no idea the purpose to that command otherwise.

Roop


>From: Sam Zoucha <szoucha@...>
>
>
>I have had this happen with my screaming mace..i believe it will happen
>with any weapon that casts a spell effect.. by the way you dont have to
>zone or log to get it to stop..i find if i repeatedly click on a song
>rapidly that you will get the message you havent recovered yet after
>this you can sing songs normally....this is an annoying bug that i hope
>they fix as soon as they have time
>
>
> Drizil Thunderblade wandering bard of fennin ro
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>At 07:32 PM 4/22/99 -0000, you wrote:
>>From: Paco1@...
>>
>>I use a tentical whip every once in a while. When it does the lifetap the
>song I am playing seems to lock. When this happens all the spell buttons
>turn back to normal and I cant start a song new because the other one is
>still going, nor can I stop it without haveing to log or zone.
>>
>>Has this happened to anyone else?
>>
>>Tanas, Bard of the World, Tarrew Marr
>>
